Class HDBManagerApplicationController

java.lang.Object
controller.HDBManagerApplicationController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IHDBManagerApplicationController
public class HDBManagerApplicationController extends Object implements IHDBManagerApplicationController
Controller for handling HDB Manager's application approval operations
